message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have less, I'll take the majority
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not giving up too much!
You're getting desperate, I'll take most of it
I'm not giving up yet, I'll try to get a better deal
You're running out of time, take it or leave it
